name: @ull-esit-dsi-1617/scapegoat
description: A small library providing utility methods to escape and unescape HTML entities

scripts.commit: npm run doc; git add docs; git ci -am `jq .version package.json`
scripts.patch: npm run commit; npm version patch
scripts.patch:publish: npm run patch; git push; npm publish
scripts.patch:publish:production:test: npm run patch:publish; npm run production:test

author: Casiano Rodriguez <casiano.rodriguez.leon@gmail.com>
